downloadDescription: The Lync Alignment Questionnaire is designed to provide a record of the customer conversations starting from the UC Strategy Workshop and continuing through the Lync Technical Briefing and proposal activities.
detailsSection:
The Lync Alignment Questionnaire is designed to provide a record of the customer conversations starting from the UC Strategy Workshop and continuing through the Lync Technical Briefing and proposal activities. 
It is recommended that partners use this document as the North Star for deployment planning and use as a form of record of the customer’s deployment process.
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
